code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'./Assignments.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Assignments=()=>{const[assignments,setAssignments]=useState([]);const[newAssignment,setNewAssignment]=useState({asset:'',personnelName:'',quantity:0,base:''});useEffect(()=>{fetchAssignments();},[]);const fetchAssignments=async()=>{const res=await axios.get('/api/assignments');setAssignments(res.data);};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();await axios.post('/api/assignments',newAssignment);fetchAssignments();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl font-bold mb-4",children:"Assignments"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"space-y-2 mb-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Asset ID",value:newAssignment.asset,onChange:e=>setNewAssignment({...newAssignment,asset:e.target.value})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Personnel Name",value:newAssignment.personnelName,onChange:e=>setNewAssignment({...newAssignment,personnelName:e.target.value})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Quantity",type:"number",value:newAssignment.quantity,onChange:e=>setNewAssignment({...newAssignment,quantity:e.target.value})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Base ID",value:newAssignment.base,onChange:e=>setNewAssignment({...newAssignment,base:e.target.value})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Assign"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:assignments.map(a=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[a.asset.name," - ",a.quantity," to ",a.personnelName]},a._id))})]});};export default Assignments;
